fixed_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 53.1/55.8/58.4% of Attack. 29.5/31.0/32.4% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Mabufu

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. After using a skill on a foe, increase main target's Ice damage taken by 6.6% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Release of Grudges

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. After using a skill on a foe, increase main target's Ice damage taken by 7.5% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Release of Grudges I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
